programme.title: Trash Talker
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E18, Doug's grade-school nemesis (guest star Jon Favreau) is Deacon's new friend and may become Carrie's new boss.

programme.title: Precedent Nixin
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E19, Carrie's plan to stay at a hotel while visiting Florida backfires when the hotel is overrun by spring breakers.

programme.title: Foe: Pa
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E20, When Arthur embarrasses Carrie at a job interview, Doug must heal the breach between father and daughter.

programme.title: Tank Heaven
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E21, Doug sabotages Carrie's efforts to socialize with her co-workers by doing crass things, such as showing them his chest hair. Amy Stiller guest stars.

programme.title: Alter Ego
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E22, Doug, Deacon, Danny and Spence take an impulsive trip to Memphis to try to stop the wedding of Spence's ex-girlfriend (Rachel Dratch).

programme.title: Icky Shuffle
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E23, Carrie comes down with a cold; Arthur must find a teammate for the senior center's shuffleboard tournament.

programme.title: Awful Bigamy
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E24, When Holly is kicked out of her apartment, Arthur insists she stay with him until she can find someplace new to live.

programme.title: Lost Vegas
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E01, Doug takes Carrie to a spa, hoping it will get her to let him take a trip to Vegas with the guys; Arthur teaches Spence his trick for beating the house in blackjack.

programme.title: Durgan Groupie
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E02, Jealous of Carrie's new job, Doug asks his boss for a promotion and gets put in charge of safety.

programme.title: Furious Gorge
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E03, Carrie makes Doug join a support group for overeaters, but he secretly joins an abusive relationship group where he blames his eating on her.

programme.title: Entertainment Weakly
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E04, Doug sends a new driver on the wrong route, but the plan backfires when the man winds up in the hospital.

programme.title: Name Dropper
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E05, Doug digs a deeper hole for himself when he fakes a heart attack to avoid angering Carrie for not knowing her friend's name.

programme.title: Offtrack...Bedding
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E06, Doug goes looking for his father at a model train convention and notices his mother with very seductive Arthur Spooner.

programme.title: Silent Mite
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E07, Doug and Arthur play detective when Doug suspects an admirer of Carrie has stolen his wallet.

programme.title: Awed Couple
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E08, Deacon and Kelly find new couple friends, forcing Doug and Carrie to turn to their old reliable couple friends, Neal and Marcy.

programme.title: Cologne Ranger
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E09, Doug wears a cologne Carrie dislikes to try to convince himself and the guys that she does not control him.

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E10, Carrie gets a raise and hires a Spanish-speaking housekeeper, but the language barrier frustrates Doug, who retaliates by hiring Veronica as his personal housekeeper.

programme.title: Pour Judgement
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E11, Carrie is upset when Doug does not take an exam that could have led to a promotion, so he retaliates by becoming a bartender.

programme.title: Gym Neighbors
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E12, When Doug and Carrie start training with their neighbor (Lou Ferrigno) so Carrie can lose a few pounds, Doug works out a deal that allows him to laze around during exercise time.

programme.title: Gorilla Warfare
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E13, When Carrie learns Doug stole the romantic line he used when they started dating, he struggles to come up with a new one for Valentine's Day to try to redeem himself.

programme.title: Hi, School
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E14, When Doug makes a delivery to his former high school, the football coach (Burt Reynolds) treats him like a hero, so Doug begins stopping by more often.

programme.title: Deconstructing Carrie
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E15, As Carrie reluctantly approaches her 35th birthday, Doug bribes neighborhood construction workers to hoot and holler at her in order to make her feel younger.

programme.title: Black List
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E16, Doug tries to find his roots when Deacon snubs him for a new black friend, and Carrie's manicurist refuses to see her.

programme.title: Wish Boned
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E17, Doug's elation at winning two tickets to the NCAA Final Four turns to guilt when Carrie prompts him to take Arthur instead of Deacon.

programme.title: Van Go
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E18, Holly is upset when she learns Carrie was using her to have access to her van; Doug has an argument with a waitress who takes too long to deliver his food.

programme.title: Ice Cubed
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E19, Carrie is overcome with guilt when she gets a digital music player for free because of the cashier's inattention.

programme.title: Catching Hell
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E20, Spence pretends to be Carrie's husband at a work event when a client finds Doug to be disagreeable; Arthur's upset he isn't the center of attention.

programme.title: Slippery Slope
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E21, When Carrie discovers that her and Doug's ski weekend getaway was motivated by a promotion for a free plasma TV that Doug wants, her romantic mood sours.

programme.title: Buy Curious
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E22, When their neighbor passes away, Carrie convinces Doug it would be a smart investment to buy the house and sell it for profit.

programme.title: Pole Lox
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E01, Doug convinces Carrie to take pole dancing lessons but is disappointed when she puts on a show for him.

programme.title: Vocal Discord
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E02, Carrie and Doug decide marriage counseling is in order and turn to their neighbor for help, but his techniques only make things worse.

programme.title: Consummate Professional
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E03, Carrie learns that in the beginning of their relationship Doug lied to her about getting a job at IPS so she would sleep with him.

programme.title: Like Hell
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E04, Doug tries to impress new driver Jared when he learns he was the only one at IPS not invited to Jared's barbecue.

programme.title: Sandwiched Out
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E05, The guys' neighborhood restaurant names a new sandwich after Deacon, so Doug determines to get some kind of food named after himself.

programme.title: Shear Torture
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E06, Carrie discovers that Doug's frequent trips to the hair salon are due to his attractive new hairstylist.

programme.title: Inn Escapable
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E07, Doug and Carrie's romantic getaway is a nightmare when the owners of the bed-and-breakfast become too much to take.

programme.title: Move Doubt
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E08, Doug and Carrie are confused when Deacon and Kelly are not interested in buying the house next door to theirs.

programme.title: G'night Stalker
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E09, Doug lets the attention go to his head when he gets anonymous e-mail from someone who saw him perform at a karaoke club.

programme.title: The Godfather (Part III)
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E22, Sam flips out when his goddaughter visits and agrees to move in with Woody.

programme.title: Norm's First Hurrah
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E23, Norm lies about the prestige of his new position at a CPA firm.

programme.title: Cheers: The Motion Picture
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E24, Woody's parents want him to move back home, but the regulars try to keep him.

programme.title: A House Is Not A Home
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E25, Sam and Diane buy a house from a couple who have been there for forty years.

programme.title: I Do, Adieu
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E26, With Sam and Diane's wedding day approaching, big questions still loom.

programme.title: Home Is The Sailor
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E01, Sam returns to Cheers after sailing around the world and wants his job back.

programme.title: "I" On Sports
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E02, Sam accepts an offer from his friend, sportscaster Dave Richards.

programme.title: Little Carla, Happy At Last (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E03, Carla and Eddie battle superstitions when they decide to get married.

programme.title: Little Carla, Happy At Last (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E04, Carla and Eddie dismiss the unfortunate events that occurred before the wedding as just bad luck.

programme.title: The Crane Mutiny
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E05, Frasier tells his friends about a recent argument with Lilith.

programme.title: Paint Your Office
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E06, Norm agrees to paint Rebecca's office in return for running up his tab.

programme.title: The Last Angry Mailman
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E07, Cliff tries to save his childhood home from getting bulldozed.

programme.title: Bidding On The Boys
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E08, Lilith gets back at Frasier for wanting her to sign a pre-nuptial agreement.

programme.title: Pudd'nhead Boyd
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E09, Woody finds a new admirer when he portrays Mark Twain as an understudy.

programme.title: A Kiss Is Still A Kiss
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E10, Sam encourages Rebecca to tell her boss she has a crush on him.

programme.title: My Fair Clavin
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E11, Cliff gives his girl a makeover and ends up losing her to every other guy.

programme.title: Christmas Cheers
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E12, Sam buys a last minute Christmas gift for Rebecca from another shopper.

programme.title: Woody For Hire Meets Norman Of The Apes
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E13, Robert Urich visits Cheers when Woody makes his television debut.

programme.title: And God Created Woodman
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E14, Sam and Woody take the rap for Rebecca when she breaks a priceless vase.

programme.title: A Tale Of Two Cuties
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E15, Carla gives birth to twins, a boy and girl. During Carla's absence, the bar hires two waitresses.

programme.title: Yacht Of Fools
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E16, Mr. Drake invites Sam and Rebecca for a weekend on his yacht. Rebecca still pines for Mr. Drake.

programme.title: To All The Girls I've Loved Before
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E17, Frasier second-guesses his wedding when the guys throw him a bachelor party.

programme.title: Let Sleeping Drakes Lie
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E18, Rebecca gets caught snooping in Evan's room when he returns from Europe early.

programme.title: Airport V
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E19, Eddie becomes an ice skater in a penguin suit for ice shows, and invites Carla to see the show in Seattle.

programme.title: The Sam In The Grey Flannel Suit
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E20, Rebecca learns Sam was promoted solely to help the softball team win.

programme.title: Our Hourly Bread
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E21, Woody and Sam want a raise, but the bar's takings have been declining for three months.

programme.title: Slumber Party Massacred
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E22, Carla's depressed when she learns she's going to be a grandmother.

programme.title: Bar Wars
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E23, Sam and his Cheers gang have lost 173 sporting competitions to their rival, Gary and Gary's Old Town Tavern.

programme.title: The Big Kiss-Off
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E24, Sam and Woody make a bet that they can kiss Rebecca before midnight.

programme.title: Back Seat Becky, Up Front
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E25, Rebecca finds out Evan is moving to Tokyo and bringing another woman along.

programme.title: How To Recede In Business
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E01, Lillian Corporation's new vice president fires Rebecca and rehires Sam as the bar's revival manager.

programme.title: Swear to God
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E02, Sam vows to be abstinent when he finds out he may have fathered a child.

programme.title: Executive Sweet
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E03, Sam traps Rebecca into declaring that she's in love with her boss.

programme.title: Cosmic Collisions
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Cosmic Collisions, S03E08, Cosmic and x rays, these mysterious and highly powerful particles from deep space are being investigated to finally discover where they come from.

programme.title: The Astronauts
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Astronauts, S02E01, One hundred kilometres above the Earth’s surface lies an invisible frontier: the edge of space.

programme.title: Shore To Shore
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Shore To Shore, S02E04, Our seafaring nature has translated well to the space age, seeking to sail out into the unknown in search of riches of one kind or another.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery: Asteroids and Comets / Galactic Visions: Alien Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E18, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled, S03E02, With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Seasons of Saturn, S03E01, Saturn is the second largest planet and has an astonishing 60 moons in its orbit. Thanks to the Cassini mission, it's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighborhood.

programme.title: Rocky Shores / Silent Partner
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E14, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Water Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Water Worlds, S03E03, The key ingredient to life in the universe is water. Until recently we thought Earth was the only place in the solar system to have any water at all. Now that probes are peering around nearby worlds we are finding that is just not the case.

programme.title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E09, Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E11, The Beginning of the End - After the first Moon landing the Apollo science program was about to start in earnest but people were losing interest. Apollo Gets Complicated - New technology is added that extends the reach of the Apollo program.

programme.title: The Space Shuttle Matures, Complex Space Construction & The Final Years of the Space Shuttle
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E13, The Space Shuttle Matures - The Space Transportation System changes the nature of orbital missions. Complex Construction in Space - Confidence in the shuttle begins to return and engineers for get the lessons of the past.

programme.title: The Shuttle Program, The Challenger Disaster & Return to Space
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E12, The Shuttle Program - The first re-useable spacecraft. The Challenger Disaster - Pressing launch schedules lead to carelessness and the loss of the Challenger. Return to Space - A re-designed shuttle is back in space with a redefined role.

programme.title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E07, The Apollo Program Begins - At the very beginning of NASA's moon project things go wrong. Caves - ESA's special training program for astronauts. Planck - Mapping the cosmic microwave background radiation.

programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E10, To the Moon - The Apollo program achieves its major objective. Dragon, Falcon and Spacex - New directions in re-usable spacecraft. Gaia- Mapping our galaxy in unprecedented detail.

programme.title: Invasion on Mars
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Invasion on Mars, S03E04, The EXO Mars and Curiosity continue their scientific discoveries as we prepare new missions both robotic and manned to the Red planet Mars.

programme.title: Proving Einstein
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Proving Einstein, S04E09, Some of the proof of Einstein’s theories had long been elusive, beyond the capabilities of technology, until now.

programme.title: Exo Planeta
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Exo Planeta, S01E09, As scientists and astronomers peer closer at nearby stars with ever more fidelity they are discovering planets; exo planets, worlds outside our own solar system.

programme.title: Tickets Please
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Tickets Please, S04E03, No spacecraft have traveled so fast or so close to a star before. It is hoped to reveal the source of the solar winds that effect us here on Earth

programme.title: Planet X
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Planet X, S04E04, The New Horizons mission continues deeper into space, it’s next target looming close.

programme.title: Where Are All the Aliens?
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Where Are All the Aliens?, S04E10, We’re looking hard, but the numbers aren’t stacking up, is life on other planets that hard to find? Even signals from an advanced race elude us.

programme.title: Edge of The Universe
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Edge of The Universe, S01E10, The night sky is a time machine. The further we look out into the universe the further back in time we reach.

programme.title: Next Stop Mars
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Next Stop Mars, S01E04, It has fired our imaginations for millennia, Mars, the God of War and the source of Man's science fictional demise.

programme.title: Living In Space
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living In Space, S03E01, How do astronauts cope with living in space? The unique environment, the lack of taste in their food and the smell of canned air all contribute to the stresses of living and working in space.

programme.title: Stars Above
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Stars Above, S02E09, Stars are a bit like human beings. They can be warm or cold, they come in all kinds of shapes and sizes.

programme.title: Living Planet
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living Planet, S03E07, With continuous observation of arth from orbit scientists have built a data set over time that reveals much about how the Earth breaths and life sustains itself on this living Planet.

programme.title: First Light
programme.desc: The New Frontier: First Light, S02E08, For an instrument first developed as recently as the 17th century, the telescope has travelled a long way.

programme.title: Hidden Havens: Icy Moons / Icy Gems: Frozen Moons
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E17, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Milky Way
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way, S04E01, This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Big Bang, S04E02, Throughout history, our nightly view of the universe has fueled our collective imagination. When it comes to the Big Bang, not even the most creative work of imagination can rival what science has revealed about the birth of the universe.

programme.title: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone, S04E03, Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Night Fire
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Night Fire, S02E05, The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful; they tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

programme.title: Fermi Paradox
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Fermi Paradox, S04E05, The Fermi Paradox asks the ultimate question: Given a few reasonable assumptions about the chance of life arising elsewhere in the universe and the distance between the stars, why has an alien civilization not presented itself?

programme.title: Episode 7: The Milky Way
programme.desc: Inside Outer Space: Episode 7: The Milky Way, S01E07, Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see.

programme.title: Murder Most Fowl
programme.desc: Bizarre Murders, S01E31, When an animal-loving loner fails to show up for Christmas dinner, detectives find the man dead in his trailer, alongside the feathery corpse of his lovebird and BFF.

programme.title: Counter Punch

programme.title: Part 2

programme.title: Part 4

programme.title: Part 5
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Death, S01E05, An Ice Warrior invasion fleet is on its way to the Moon. Back on Earth, the Doctor devises a plan to destroy the Martian fungus.

programme.title: Part 6
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Death, S01E06, Returning to the Moonbase, the Doctor confronts Slaar and the remaining Ice Warriors and must find a way of deflecting the invasion fleet that is heading towards them.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The War Games, S01E01, The TARDIS arrives in no man’s land during World War I. Rescued from the Germans, the travellers are put on trial by the British General Smythe who is not all he seems.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The War Games, S01E02, Finding evidence of alien technology in Smythe’s office, the Doctor, Jamie, and Zoe make their escape in Lady Jennifer’s ambulance, but Smythe gives orders to have them killed.

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The War Games, S01E03, The Doctor discovers that they are on an alien planet divided into different time zones where human soldiers fight never-ending wars.

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The War Games, S01E04, The Doctor and Zoe penetrate the Aliens' HQ from where the war games are controlled. Carstairs is reconditioned and exposes the Doctor and Zoe as German spies.

programme.title: Part 5
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The War Games, S01E05, In the American Civil War zone, Jamie and Lady Jennifer join forces with resistance fighters from various time zones and prepare to launch an attack on Central Control.

programme.title: Part 6
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The War Games, S01E06, The Doctor sends Zoe to the war zones to assemble a resistance force. The Doctor remains in Central Control to steal the processing machine, but the War Chief is one step ahead.

programme.title: Part 7
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The War Games, S01E07, The Doctor, Jamie, and Carstairs have escaped back to the 1917 war zone, but General Smythe is waiting for them and opens fire on them with a machine gun.

programme.title: Say It with Candy

programme.title: In Sickness and in Health
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E07, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie gives a withdrawn traveling artist a new paintbrush.

programme.title: Somewhat Surprising
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E08, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie decides to plan a surprise party for Sam.

programme.title: Not Getting Married Today, Part 1
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E09, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie discovers a 10-year-old girl playing in the bushes at Grey House.

programme.title: Not Getting Married Today, Part 2
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E10, Hallmark Original Series. Sam and Cassie face their future together.

programme.title: Brain Storm
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E16, When the Atlantis team is given two weeks of vacation leave, Dr. Rodney McKay reluctantly accepts an invitation by his former rival, Malcolm Tunney, to attend a scientific demonstration that he claims will be the solution to global warming.

programme.title: Infection
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E17, The team prepares for the worst as board a Wraith hive ship over Atlantis. They're surprised to find the Wraith crew in stasis when a malfunction on the hive ship releases the remaining crew… who have been cannibalizing one another for food.

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E18, When Dr. Jennifer Keller is observed behaving very strangely, extensive testing reveals nothing abnormal. But McKay’s investigation leads him to suspect that Dr. Keller and Neela Casol, a notorious criminal, have switched consciousnesses.

programme.title: Vegas
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E19, In an alternate universe, Detective John Sheppard is with the Las Vegas Police Department and begins to investigate a strange series of murders believed to be the work of a bizarre serial killer. Has life changed or is this a dangerous Wraith plot?

programme.title: Common Descent
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E17, Destiny discovers the survivors of an interplanetary expedition who claim their civilization, Novus, was founded two thousand years earlier by Destiny’s crew. Suddenly, they are attacked by the Drones who have discovered a way to track Destiny.

programme.title: Epilogue
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E18, Returning the settlers to their home planet Novus, the Destiny crew discover the planet has been abandoned and is on the verge of seismic destruction. While pouring through an underground archive, the crew learns of the true origins of Novus.

programme.title: Blockade
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E19, When Destiny’s attempt to recharge in a star is foiled by attacking drones, Eli suggests a risky plan to recharge in a super-hot blue giant…a star so hot it could destroy the ship…unless someone stays aboard and keeps the ship under manual control.

programme.title: Gauntlet
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E20, After a battle, Destiny’s only option for survival is a jump to the next galaxy. Crew members return to Earth to say what may be their final farewells before embarking on their journey. But a risky stop may put the entire plan in jeopardy.

programme.title: Learning Curve
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E05, As part of an exchange program with the planet Orban, O'Neill travels to Earth with a girl who possesses incredible technical knowledge. But by the time O'Neill discovers the truth behind the child's superior mind…it may be too late for them all.

programme.title: Point Of View
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E06, Alternate reality versions of Carter (Amanda Tapping) and Kawalsky (Jay Acovone) are found in Area 51. Brought to Stargate Command, they start to deteriorate. However, return to their own reality means death, as their world was invaded by Goa'uld!

programme.title: Deadman Switch
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E07, SG-1 is captured by Aris Boch, a bounty hunter chasing an evil Goa'uld named Kel'tar. He offers them freedom in exchange for their help. They agree, only to find that Kel'tar is, in fact, a Tok'ra, whose capture would endanger countless others.

programme.title: Demons
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E08, On another one of their quests, SG-1 encounters a medieval civilization and frees a woman tied to a stake as a sacrifice to a demon. When the woman is freed, the demon vows to destroy the village unless the SG-1 team is offered up in appeasement.

programme.title: Rules Of Engagement
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E09, SG-1 lands in the middle of a blazing battle between some Stargate soldiers and a Jaffa army. Believing the soldiers to be the missing-in-action SG-11 team, O'Neill and the others provide assistance… until the mystery team turns its weapons on SG-1!

programme.title: Forever In A Day
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E10, During a rescue of captured Abydonians, Daniel finds his missing wife, Sha're. But instead of greeting him, she attacks him - leading to her death at the hands of Teal'c. Distraught over her death and angry at Teal'c, Daniel quits Stargate Command.

programme.title: Past And Present
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E11, SG-1 encounters an entire planet suffering from amnesia. The planet's leader, a woman named Ke'ra, returns to Earth with SG-1 to find a cure. But as Ke'ra and Daniel develop a mutual attraction, SG-1 suspects she may not be who she appears to be.

programme.title: Jolinar's Memories
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E12, Carter's father has been captured on a moon transformed into hell. No one but Jolinar has ever escaped from hell, so Tok'ra technology is used to access Jolinar's memories from Carter's mind…but not before an old foe shows up to foil the mission!

programme.title: The Devil You Know
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E13, During a rescue attempt, SG-1 is caught by one of hell's denizens, who is determined to use the information they have to overthrow Goa'uld lord Sokar. Using Tok'ra technology, the team is forced to relive painful memories…but how much can they take?

programme.title: Brain Storm
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E16, When the Atlantis team is given two weeks of vacation leave, Dr. Rodney McKay reluctantly accepts an invitation by his former rival, Malcolm Tunney, to attend a scientific demonstration that he claims will be the solution to global warming.

programme.title: Infection
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E17, The team prepares for the worst as board a Wraith hive ship over Atlantis. They're surprised to find the Wraith crew in stasis when a malfunction on the hive ship releases the remaining crew… who have been cannibalizing one another for food.

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E18, When Dr. Jennifer Keller is observed behaving very strangely, extensive testing reveals nothing abnormal. But McKay’s investigation leads him to suspect that Dr. Keller and Neela Casol, a notorious criminal, have switched consciousnesses.

programme.title: Vegas
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E19, In an alternate universe, Detective John Sheppard is with the Las Vegas Police Department and begins to investigate a strange series of murders believed to be the work of a bizarre serial killer. Has life changed or is this a dangerous Wraith plot?

programme.title: Common Descent
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E17, Destiny discovers the survivors of an interplanetary expedition who claim their civilization, Novus, was founded two thousand years earlier by Destiny’s crew. Suddenly, they are attacked by the Drones who have discovered a way to track Destiny.

programme.title: Epilogue
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E18, Returning the settlers to their home planet Novus, the Destiny crew discover the planet has been abandoned and is on the verge of seismic destruction. While pouring through an underground archive, the crew learns of the true origins of Novus.

programme.title: Blockade
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E19, When Destiny’s attempt to recharge in a star is foiled by attacking drones, Eli suggests a risky plan to recharge in a super-hot blue giant…a star so hot it could destroy the ship…unless someone stays aboard and keeps the ship under manual control.

programme.title: Gauntlet
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E20, After a battle, Destiny’s only option for survival is a jump to the next galaxy. Crew members return to Earth to say what may be their final farewells before embarking on their journey. But a risky stop may put the entire plan in jeopardy.

programme.title: Learning Curve
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E05, As part of an exchange program with the planet Orban, O'Neill travels to Earth with a girl who possesses incredible technical knowledge. But by the time O'Neill discovers the truth behind the child's superior mind…it may be too late for them all.

programme.title: Point Of View
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E06, Alternate reality versions of Carter (Amanda Tapping) and Kawalsky (Jay Acovone) are found in Area 51. Brought to Stargate Command, they start to deteriorate. However, return to their own reality means death, as their world was invaded by Goa'uld!

programme.title: Deadman Switch
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E07, SG-1 is captured by Aris Boch, a bounty hunter chasing an evil Goa'uld named Kel'tar. He offers them freedom in exchange for their help. They agree, only to find that Kel'tar is, in fact, a Tok'ra, whose capture would endanger countless others.

programme.title: Demons
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E08, On another one of their quests, SG-1 encounters a medieval civilization and frees a woman tied to a stake as a sacrifice to a demon. When the woman is freed, the demon vows to destroy the village unless the SG-1 team is offered up in appeasement.

programme.title: Rules Of Engagement
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E09, SG-1 lands in the middle of a blazing battle between some Stargate soldiers and a Jaffa army. Believing the soldiers to be the missing-in-action SG-11 team, O'Neill and the others provide assistance… until the mystery team turns its weapons on SG-1!

programme.title: Forever In A Day
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E10, During a rescue of captured Abydonians, Daniel finds his missing wife, Sha're. But instead of greeting him, she attacks him - leading to her death at the hands of Teal'c. Distraught over her death and angry at Teal'c, Daniel quits Stargate Command.

Mandie and the Forgotten Christmas, 20110901000000 +0000, When Mandie Shaw is thrust into Miss Heathwood’s School for Girls at Christmastime, she struggles to grasp the boarding school’s new rules and the finer points of high society.

programme.desc: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla 2, 19931211000000 +0000, Mechagodzilla® is the ultimate in Godzilla®-busting weaponry. Fueled by a nuclear reactor and sheathed in a synthetic diamond shield, the mammoth metal robot is Japan's greatest hope for ending Godzilla®'s reign of terror.

Godzilla vs. Spacegodzilla, 19941210000000 +0000, Japan's Counter G Bureau enters the New Age with Project T, in which a telepathic amplifier is implanted in Godzilla's brain to bring the giant monster under control. In a faraway galaxy, the mutant Space Godzilla turns its evil eyes toward earth!

Rebirth of Mothra 3, 19981212000000 +0000, In the final film in the new 'Mothra' trilogy, King Ghidorah, the most destructive of all the monsters, returns to destroy the Earth. In the end, Mothra is indeed triumphant and takes her place among the greatest of all monsters.
